alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 21 at 2:47PM EST until December 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson and Coastal Wakulla Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Water levels will rise to 1.5 to 2.5 feet mean higher high water around the time of high tide. These water levels will result in minor flooding along the coast at Mashes Sands Beach, Panacea, and St Marks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels will be highest around the time of high tide which is around 1 am ET Friday morning. The threat for coastal flooding will end as winds shift offshore around daybreak.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
